question.name: study001_fc
question.summary: Find genes which are differentially expressed in a Transcriptomics experiment.
question.description:
Find genes which are differentially expressed in a transcriptomics experiment. First choose an experiment as the available comparisons may change. If only one "Experiment" is available, this field will be selected for you.

Choose the directionality and the magnitude of the difference.
For example, selecting up-regulated with a fold difference of 2 will only show results where the intensity of the comparator is twice that of the reference.

columnAttribute.name: log2_reference_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean log2 mRNA expression level for the reference condition

columnAttribute.name: log2_alternative_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean log2 mRNA expression level for the alternate, comparison condition

columnAttribute.name: fold_change
columnAttribute.help: fold change based on raw mRNA expression levels

columnAttribute.name: reference_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean mRNA expression level for the reference condition

columnAttribute.name: alternative_mean
columnAttribute.help: mean mRNA expression level for the alternate, comparison condition

columnAttribute.name: confidence_interval
columnAttribute.help: [log2 lower, log2 upper] 95% confidence interval on fold change. Most useful for interpreting fold changes less/greater than +/-2. If the interval is broad or lower and upper limits have opposing signs, then the there is less confidence in the fold change value.
